title: Ranger

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, set up traps at a player's house, tagging the target and all who visit.
- Stakeout a house, killing all Tagged players who visit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can tag and attack astral visitors.
- You cannot stakeout twice in a row.
- If you kill a Town member whose alignment is not Town Evil, you will be left with one charge of Stakeout left.

desc:
Post 342
*I forgot how long I've been standing here.*
Astral Visitor
